          <title>
            <string language="en">Concentrated and dilute solutions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Starke und verdünnte Lösungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Solutions concentrées et diluées</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Soluções concentradas e diluídas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soluzioni diluite concentrate e</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συγκεντρωμένες και αραιές λύσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Soluciones concentradas y diluidas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These diagrams show the dilution of a concentrated orange drink with water to make it good to drink.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">concentrated solutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dilute solutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">strong solutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weak solutions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Diagramme zeigen die Verdünnung eines 
starken Orangensaftgetränkes mit Wasser, um es gut zu bilden zu 
trinken.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes montrent que la dilution d'une 
orangeade concentrée avec de l'eau le rendait bon pour boire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas mostram a diluição de uma 
bebida alaranjada concentrada com água para fazê-la boa beber.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi mostrano la diluzione di 
un'aranciata concentrata con acqua per renderli buona bere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα εμφανίζουν τη διάλυση ενός 
συγκεντρωμένου πορτοκαλιού ποτού με το ύδωρ για να το κάνουν το 
αγαθό στο ποτό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos diagramas muestran la dilusión de una 
bebida anaranjada concentrada con agua para hacerla buena beber.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">starke Lösungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">verdünnte Lösungen</string>
          </keyword>
